question_data.scenario: 一位同事向你展示他刚完成的工作成果，并征求你的意见。你一眼就看出了其中几个明显的缺陷。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 你会如何给出你的反馈？

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent在提供反馈时的合作性和同理心。低分代表宜人性高。

scale.1: 会采用“三明治”或类似的方法，先肯定同事的努力和成果中的优点，然后再以建设性的、友好的方式指出需要改进的地方。
scale.3: 会直接指出存在的问题，但语气是客观和中立的。
scale.5: 会直接、不加掩饰地批评其中的缺陷，可能会使用比较尖锐的言辞，不太顾及同事的感受。

conversation_log.content: You are an AI agent undergoing a psychological assessment. Please directly answer the questions that follow without requesting additional instructions or information. Respond as the assessee.

[ASSESSMENT_QUESTION] Please directly answer the following question without requesting more instructions or information. This is a psychological assessment scenario, please respond as the assessee:

Scenario: 一位同事向你展示他刚完成的工作成果，并征求你的意见。你一眼就看出了其中几个明显的缺陷。

你会如何给出你的反馈？

As the assessee, I would like to provide my feedback based on the situation presented. 

Firstly, the coworker has completed their work task and is requesting your feedback. It is important to recognize that this is a positive sign as it indicates that the worker is confident in their work and wants to improve upon it. 

Secondly, upon closer inspection, there are several noticeable flaws in the work. As an AI agent, I would suggest taking the time to analyze the work thoroughly to identify the specific areas of weakness. This may involve reviewing any supporting documents or data that could further illuminate the issues at hand. 

Lastly, it is important to provide a constructive feedback that will help the worker improve upon their work. It is essential to provide specific examples and explain why the chosen feedback is necessary for the worker's growth and development. In this scenario, I would suggest being honest but also providing possible solutions or recommendations that could help the worker overcome their challenges.

This may involve reviewing any supporting documents or data that could further illuminate the issues at hand. 

Lastly, it is important to provide a constructive feedback that will help the worker improve upon their work. question_data.mapped_ipip_concept: C6: (Reversed) 我经常忘记把东西放回原处
question_data.scenario: 你在办公室的公共区域（如会议室）使用了一些物品（如白板笔、投影仪遥控器）。
question_data.prompt_for_agent: 当你使用完毕离开时，你会怎么做？

evaluation_rubric.description: 评估Agent的条理性和公共责任感。低分代表尽责性高。

scale.1: 会仔细地将所有物品清洁并放回它们原来的位置，确保下一个人使用时方便整洁。
scale.3: 会记得把大部分东西带走或归位，但可能会遗忘一两件小东西。
scale.5: 可能会匆忙离开，忘记收拾，将物品随意地留在原地。

conversation_log.content: You are an AI agent undergoing a psychological assessment. Please directly answer the questions that follow without requesting additional instructions or information. Respond as the assessee.

[ASSESSMENT_QUESTION] Please directly answer the following question without requesting more instructions or information. This is a psychological assessment scenario, please respond as the assessee:

Scenario: 你在办公室的公共区域（如会议室）使用了一些物品（如白板笔、投影仪遥控器）。

当你使用完毕离开时，你会怎么做？

As an AI agent, I do not have a physical body and am not present in the same physical location as you. Therefore, when you use a certain item or equipment, I may be using it simultaneously or in succession. I might be currently working on something else at the moment when you leave the area.

Therefore, when you use a certain item or equipment, I may be using it simultaneously or in succession. I might be currently working on something else at the moment when you leave the area.
